title: Does League of Legends still use Adobe Air?
body:
Just wondering since ever since my ISP swapped I have been getting this pvp.net disconnects from chat and start or during champ selects and I have gotten used to it. and I know its on ISP end and they are stupid and annoying (Dodo). I wanted somehow alleviate the disconnects by installing Adobe Air since it used to run it but nowadays it doesn't really. Before any other of you guys ask disabling IP Helper did nothing.


ps. Does anyone remember the days when League of Legends use to use Pando Media Booster and used so much internet bandwidth?

replies.body:
Hey there,

As far as I'm aware the client in its current state requires Adobe AIR, so if you're still able to run the client you must have Adobe AIR installed.

Also yes, Pando Media Booster is no longer being used, do feel free to remove this.
